## hpr0840 :: Android Shopping

 
In today's show Cobra 2 gives us the advice never to impulse buy an Android device. Do your research on the hardware, wireless and the software. Start your research on the cyanogenmod wiki. He continues with tips on what to look out for on each device.

Editor's Note:

The original link no longer exists:
https://wiki.cyanogenmod.com/index.php?title=Main_Page


To view the contents from 2011-10-22 use the following Internet Archive link:
https://web.archive.org/web/20111022001154/https://wiki.cyanogenmod.com/index.php?title=Main_Page
